---
title: "Example of interaction in ANCOVA"
output: html_document
---

```{r echo = F, warning = F, message = F}
library(nycflights13)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

jfk <- weather %>% filter(origin == "JFK", month == 7 | month == 12) %>% 
  mutate(month = as.factor(month)) %>%
  mutate(month = recode_factor(month, "7" = "July", 
                               "12" = "December"))

ggplot(jfk, aes(x = humid, y = temp, color = month)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") + 
  labs(x = "Percent humidty", y = "Temperature (\u00B0F)", 
       title = "Relationship between humidity and temeperature
       in NYC during summer and winter")
```
